title: Monday Night Networking
desc: Monday Night Networking ?is a combination of? networking , business support and resources exchange for women entrepreneurs. Join us for the second or fourth Monday for... 6-6:30 PM?.. ?Introductions: ??Please arrive promptly at 6:00 PM so you will have the opportunity to introduce yourself and your business. 6:30 ? 7pm?? General Mingling 7 ? 7:40pm?.. Masterminding :??We will break into small groups. ?Each person will have the opportunity to share a current challenge and receive assistance. 7:40 ? 8pm?..Resource Sharing: ??please come prepared to end each evening with opportunities to GIVE ( favorite articles, books, services, etc.), GET (help, suggestions, referrals, etc.) and/or share an Announcement about your upcoming events, etc. ? For more info, visit  In Good Company .
